goal.ch:
「審計乃針對管理階層有關經濟活動及事項所作之聲明(assertions)，客觀地蒐集及評估相關證據的系統化程序，以確認各項聲明符合某既定標準(準則) (established criteria)的程序，並將所獲結果傳達給利害關係人(interested users)。」
依既定標準 (準則) 區分 
財務報表審計(financial statement audit)，此類審計工作主要係蒐集足夠適切的證據，據以確認財務報表是否符合特定之財務報導編製準則，如IFRS、稅法或其他綜合會計基礎等。 
作業審計(operational audit)，此類審計工作主要係蒐集足夠適切的證據，據以確認受查者是否達成其所訂的作業流程或經營的績效目標，進而出具改善經營效率及效果建議的報告。 
遵循審計(compliance audit)，此類審計工作主要係蒐集足夠適切的證據，據以確認受查者是否依循某一特定的法規、作業規範或契約條件等。
goal.en:
“Auditing is a systematic process of objectively collecting and evaluating evidence concerning assertions made by management regarding economic activities and events to confirm that the assertions meet established criteria, and Communicate the results obtained to interested users.”
 Distinguish according to established criteria (criteria)
 Financial statement audit, which mainly collects sufficient and appropriate evidence to confirm whether the financial statements comply with specific financial reporting standards, such as IFRS, tax law or other comprehensive accounting basis.
 Operational audit, this type of audit mainly collects sufficient and appropriate evidence to confirm whether the interviewee has achieved the operational process or business performance goals set by him, and then issue a report with recommendations for improving business efficiency and effectiveness. .
 Compliance audit, which mainly collects sufficient and appropriate evidence to confirm whether the respondent has complied with a particular regulation, code of practice or contractual conditions.

查核人員規劃的第一階段,是蒐集資料 了解受查者的業務.第二階段,則是依據蒐集到資訊做決策:擬定查核計畫 所謂查核計畫係指會計師之初步規劃或基本規劃,它是查核工作的書面綱要,再表達查核人員的審計策略,也是查核規劃所得的初步結果.
outline.en: The auditor must  decide the appropriate audit objectives and the evidence to accumulate to meet those objectives on every audit. To do this,auditors follow an audit process,which is a well-defined methodology for organizing an audio to ensure that the evidence gathered is both sufficient and appropriate and that all required audie objectives are both specified and met.If the client is an accelerated filer public company,the auditor must also plan to meet the objectives associated with reporting on the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting.PCAOB Auditing Standard 5requires that the audit of the effectiveness of internal control be integrated with the audit of the financial statements.
